rComments: Marco was a really great teacher. He really truly cared about the subject and improving your writing. Revisions are very important and determine your effort to Marco. Lectures were super chill and he showed us cool videos. :-)

HIs class can be pretty tough. He grades hard and can be harsh but he really wants his students to excel. Very passionate about what he teaches and improved my writing. Also shows tons of interesting videos in his lectures.

Marco is super cool. He is very opinionated and he'll tear you apart for a bad essay, but if you try your best and ask for help he's pretty great. A+, I'm a decent writer but I put in minimal effort. He'll write letters of rec too. Definitely one of the better core teachers.

I felt really intimidated talking to him and reading my paper out loud during the smaller sections. I love writing, and I think constructive criticism is great, but some of the comments were a bit hurtful and embarrassing.~especially when he's saying it indirectly to you. But the class got better as I met with my TA more for one-on-one tutoring.

Marco was a great teacher.  Kind of intimidating at first, but if you get to know him and let him get to know you he really cares about his students.  I got all of my papers back with substantial feedback, and overall learned a lot from Marco! Put in the time and effort and you'll do well in this class, if you're lazy you'll get what you deserve.

Marco is really hard on students, but he tries to be fair about it. He is a little intimidating at first, but in reality is very approachable and makes himself available to his students if they need help. A fair lecturer and a nice man.

I loved having him as a lecturer.  He is harsh if you don't do your best in the class, but as long as you put forth the effort, it's fine.  He's not unreasonable at all.  I respect him a lot and he's a very interesting person if you get to know him.  He also improved my writing a lot and gives you a lot of feedback.  I would totally recommend him.

if you don't agree with him he will chew you out infront of other students. not a safe learning space. avoid him if you can, but if you cant write a paper that he agrees with, trust me, you will know what he thinks, he only tells you 10 billion times

true, he does play favorites. maybe I enjoyed him because i felt like one of them... he doesnt really give too much feedback (he usually said my papers only needed 2 commas...i know they need more than that). interesting coursework, really thought provoking. i do reccomend him for the wide breadth of topics he covers.not sure if he's still teaching
Very interesting lecturer.  True he doesnt return work, and he kinda plays favorites but this class is awesome and i competely recommend him.
TERRIBLE PROFESSOR!!!! Probably hands out papers every full moon! How is a writer suppose to improve if he never gets feedback from his professors. Do not recommend him for any class.
He was an interesting guy but very opinionated and assuming.  The writing group was a waster of time

In order to do well in his class, you have to find some interest in the class material in general.  Pretty much like most classes.  Although you may not initially like him, you have to think about core's goal: to get you to write better, and he does just that.
Good Professor! Very opinionated. Passionate. Does not return papers in a timely manner, makes it hard to improve. Interesting lectures. Unorthodox methods of teaching. Recommended!
he is a guy of many assumptions...That might get you a better grade, if he assumes something about you. Not a very good grader, althought somewhat leanent

Marco is a very bitter guy. He can be helpful, you just need to dig into him a little bit. He is very intelligent, and his heart is in the right place. If you give him a chance, you can get a lot out of the class. He is pretty lenient as long as you try hard and show it.

I disagree with the above reviewer. I've written essays which he does not agree with at all and got good grades on them. This class also provides more grade feedback than my other classes. The class is good, and the way he teaches it is both great and unorthodox. Recommended.

If you want your papers returned to you, swtich out of this class.  If you want to be graded on writing rather than adherence to professors opinion, do not take his class.  He is a good man, really, but as far as grades, not so much.
